text: Sweet Anita (born 28 July 1990) is an English Twitch streamer and YouTuber. Anita was raised in East Anglia by a single mother before moving to Southwest England. She was diagnosed with a rare form of Tourette's syndrome when she was aged 27. Anita began streaming on Twitch in 2018. She became well known for playing Overwatch. She became popular for her sudden angry reactions, caused by her tics. Later that year, Variety named Anita among the most influential people in video games. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:English entertainers Category:British YouTubers Category:Twitch (service) streamers
title: Sweet Anita
